taste for the simple and quiet, rustic simplicity, austere refinement, wabi
miserable, wretched, lonely, dreary, shabby, comfortless

to be worried, to be grieved
to be worried, to be grieved, to pine for

sdata.j: あなたがいなくなったら、この↑世↑↓よ↓は↑本当↑↓ほんとう↓に↑侘↑↓わ↓びしくなるわ。
sdata.e: What a lonely world it would be with you away!

sdata.j: なるべく↑考↑↓かんが↓えまいとは↑思↑↓おも↓っていたのだが、↑自覚↑↓じかく↓をしてしまうと↑途端↑↓とたん↓に↑侘↑↓わび↓しいような↑気持↑↓きも↓ちにもなってくる。
sdata.e: I had tried to avoid thinking that as much as possible but as soon as I faced it I started to feel miserable.

sdata.j: 「↑侘↑↓わ↓び↑寂↑↓さ↓び」とは↑何↑↓なん↓ですか。
